title: Putting COVID-19 in Its Place
description: Public webinar on COVID-19 discussing the following topics:  Understanding the COVID-19 crisis is critical to managing its outcome. This raises some central questions. Why is the pandemic not the same for every person in every place? How do the risks and uncertainties of the virus shape scientific, governmental and individual responses?
